full_threads.body:
Hi, there https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/emojis/32x32/1f44b.png
I think it's all set now. Are you able to reload the site now?
See the location: header. The URL should now be redirected to the trailingslash.

curl -I https://www.dcsgroup.com.au/infographic
HTTP/2 301
server: nginx
date: Tue, 04 Sep 2018 01:55:45 GMT
content-type: text/html
content-length: 178
location: https://www.dcsgroup.com.au/infographic/
x-content-type-options: nosniff

--

https://static.intercomassets.com/avatars/1018766/square_128/me-1513555488.jpg?1513555488 Thoriq from Kinsta

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:47 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Cool - thanks!

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:46 AM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Ok. It's been a while, let me review the redirect :)

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:44 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Not quite, you created redirects for us for: /e-book, /infographic, /join-us - they are static HTML pages (outside of the main WP install, in the root).

We need these to load with a forward slash at the end of them, so /e-book/ etc.

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:43 AM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

So this time we are just looking these URLs /infographic and /join-us ? Am I getting it right?

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:42 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

The client needs them to load with a trailing forward slash, e.g. /e-book/ not /e-book

This is the same for the /infographic and /join-us redirects. They need to be /infographic/ and /join-us/

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:41 AM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi, there https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/emojis/32x32/1f44b.png
How can we help you?

On Tue, Sep 4, 2018 at 11:41 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi Thoriq, can you please help me with these redirects again?

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:43 PM, "Operator" <operator@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Help Thoriq understand how they’re doing:

Rate your conversation

https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-1-60x60-at-2x-cc6116cc4574ac8e283a60089d2361e96011d816a2db7166bd9889e384d5c568.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-2-60x60-at-2x-c5ee794dd37323f8c376be7ecae997254c060663be96cdc9b51af65702744b55.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-3-60x60-at-2x-4ca083c0a210db4fc8ad18d8c491ce4e74da65117b9bd6d534f697912a5b9005.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-4-60x60-at-2x-96270f90826bff485ba88c83f0a2294224466d1f721872bc23c879ddd2312883.png https://static.intercom-mail.com/assets/ratings/rating-5-60x60-at-2x-e182d0473f839f9bde196b2b1fdd50fef6c8179e75e09558bcbf29ce3d94f51e.png

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:43 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Alright then, have a good day https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/emojis/32x32/1f44b.png :)

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:43 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Nope that's it for now.

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:42 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/stickers/1f389.png

Is there anything else we can help you with?

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:42 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Awesome, it's working perfectly now.

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:29 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi, there https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/emojis/32x32/1f44b.png
Are you able to reload the URLs now?
For the record, I had to delete the redirect for /e-book/ as it caused a redirect loop issue.

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:26 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Sure. One moment.

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:22 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Awesome! That worked!! Thanks

Can I ask you to do the same for /join-us and /ebook please?

Sorry it's /e-book

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:22 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Are you able to reload the URL now?

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:21 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Great - thansk

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:20 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

I think we can set up the index for that directory.
Let me check the site for a moment.

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:19 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

We have a client that wants to add a static landing page to the server, i.e. not in WordPress. We have uploaded it to: https://www.dcsgroup.com.au/infographic/ it only loads if we add the index.html after the directory or we get an apache error. Is there a way around this?

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:18 PM, "Thoriq Firdaus" <thoriq.firdaus@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi, there https://js.intercomcdn.com/images/emojis/32x32/1f44b.png
How can we help you?

On Thu, Aug 23, 2018 at 12:17 PM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi Guys
